short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: sysPass integration for modern web browsers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unofficial browser plugin for https://syspass.org/en

Access passwords shared with you directly where you can use them.

Fork of KeePassXC-Browser using sysPass as a backend.
